item.title: About
item.description: I’m Oliver Fleckenstein. I’m a software developer for the web and mobile, and I always enjoy new challenges to learn and grow by. Software skills Programming languages and frameworks C# (.NET Core / ASP NET / Xamarin) Python F# Java Swift I have dappled around with several other languages, and find it interesting to see how different tools try to solve the same problems. Web technologies TypeScript/JavaScript React HTML/CSS SQL (PostgreSQL, SQLite) Docker
